Text:
Quote "This extremely rare version contains the footage missing from ALL other prints."
Untrue...
The Swedish Videce release was availible uncut without the fogging that plagues the Japanese VHS release.

This is probably one of the best Italian/Spanish made horrorfilms ever made.
For christs sake where is the 1080P remastered version?!?!? *unbeleivable*

Thnx for the ul tho l_t...

/Nina
